```{r}
library(sf)
library(tmap)
library(terra)
```

```{r}
tww_landquart <- read_sf("_data/tww_landquart.gpkg")

swissimage <- terra::rast("_data/swissimage_2m_landquart.tif")

```

---

```{r, echo = FALSE}
tm_shape(swissimage) +
  tm_rgb() +
  tm_shape(tww_landquart, is.master = TRUE) +
  tm_polygons() +
  tm_scale_bar(position = c(1,0), just = c(1,0),bg.color = "white")
```
